|rad3oui = |rad3_ant_conn = |rad3txchains = 4 |rad3rxchains = 4 |rad3sstreams = 4 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad3ax = 1148 |nqam3 = 1000 |rad3n = 600 |rad3g = 54 |rad3b = 11 |rad3freq = 2.4 |rad3correv = |rad3cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *P/N: WR00ZAE31TB "WAVE RUNNER 11AX [MAIN BOARD]", "PWB:ARCT05381 RevB", and :"30-NOV-2017" are silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The difference is the W31 has a matte black colored bottom while the W30's bottom is silver. A variant called W30 is mentioned with the C2PC request documents at the FCC. {{FCC ST|01/22/2019|indexme.}} *[http://productspec.ul.com/document.php?id=NWGQ.E214476 ''Arris SURFboard'' on '''UL Product Spec'''] :The tagline comes from [http://productspec.ul.com/document.php?id=NWGQ.E214476 this] list of UL Certified products from ''[[Arris]]'' :The 2.4GHz radio doubles as a receive-only 1x1:1 5GHz radio. ==See also== *[https://24wireless.info/list-of-11ax-routers ''List of WiFi 6 Routers'' on '''24|Wireless'''] • [https://24wireless.info/wifi6-router-compare Compare] (JP) :;Models 
	SURFboard mAX Pro	SURFboard mAX Pro	SURFboard mAX Plus	SURFboard mAX Plus
	Mesh Wi-Fi System	Mesh Wi-Fi Router	Mesh Wi-Fi System	Mesh Wi-Fi Router
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Wi-Fi Speed:	AX11000		AX11000			AX7800			AX7800
Wi-Fi Stream:	12 stream	12 stream		8 stream		8 stream
Wi-Fi Bands:	4x4 2.4/5GHz	4x4 2.4/5GHz		2x2 2.4/5GHz		2x2 2.4/5GHz
Wi-Fi Bands:	4x4 5GHz (BH)	4x4 5GHz (BH)		4x4 5GHz (BH)		4x4 5GHz (BH)
Backhaul (BH):	4x4 (4.8Gbps)	4x4 (4.8Gbps)		4x4 (4.8Gbps)		4x4 (4.8Gbps)
Wi-Fi Coverage:	6,000 sf	3,000 sf		6,000 sf		3,000 sf
GbE Ports:	8 (2x 4)	4			8 (2x 4)		4
Routers (pack):	2		1			2			1
:;[[List of 802.11ax Hardware]] • [[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]] *[[ARRIS SURFboard mAX Pro (W31)]] (AX11000) • [https://www.amazon.com/ARRIS-Surfboard-Pro-AX11000-W31/dp/B07M8TZ1KM/ B07M8TZ1KM] :[https://www.arris.com/surfboard/products/max-mesh-wi-fi-system/ax11000/ SURFboard mAX Pro Mesh Wi-Fi 6 System] *[[ARRIS SURFboard mAX Plus (W130)]] (AX7800) • [https://www.amazon.com/ARRIS-Surfboard-Plus-AX7800-Router/dp/B07MD414J4/ B07MD414J4] :[https://www.arris.com/surfboard/products/max-mesh-wi-fi-system/ax7800/ AX7800 SURFboard mAX Plus Mesh Wi-Fi 6 System] *[[Arris SBR-AC3200P]] - SURFboard Wi-Fi Router with RipCurrent *[[Arris SBR-AC1900P]] - SURFboard Wi-Fi Router with RipCurrent *[[Arris SBR-AC1200P]] - SURFboard Wi-Fi Router with RipCurrent *[[Arris SBX-AC1200P]] - SURFboard Wi-Fi Hotspot with RipCurrent *[[Arris SBX-1000P]] - SURFboard Wired Network Extender with RipCurrent [[Category:English Documentation]]
